title: Cohasset house to share
posting_body: Looking for responsible, mature housemate, working professional to share house with other healthy, non-smoking, non-drug taking professional in lovely South Shore Town, situated on private Drive.
Would like at least 1 year commitment.
House will be shared with professional, college educated full-time working landlord who works long hours.
Cleaning duties will be shared, (mopping, vacuuming, dusting, etc) must be willing to share runs to town dump every other week to dispose garbage and recyclables.
due on the first each month.
Responsibility for utilities will be half of electric bill, Half of oil fuel bill and $50 per month for the cable bill.
Please know the electric bill is much less in the summer and spring and the Oil fuel bill is only paid six months out of the year
You’ll have: your own room, your own parking in the driveway, your own refrigerator, your own private bathroom, laundry facilities in the house and a full kitchen.
There are two TVs downstairs both hooked up to cable.
I have one cat so someone with another cat or friendly dog is ok.
MUST love cats and dogs, animals in general.
If you do not like dogs or cats or animals in general please do NOT apply.
This is a great place to live if you like the quiet.
You’ll have your own room but you will have access to the house and garage.
It’s more like you’re renting the house.
There is also some storage space in the closets.
- 3/4 of a mile down from Shaws supermarket, Walgreens, Bank Of America, gas station, Starbucks
No smoking of any kind not even for medicine
No pit bull dogs or aggressive dog breeds.
